definition: THAAD (Terminal High Altitude Area Defense), US Army anti-ballistic missile system
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
Sadr (name)/Moqtada Sadr (c. 1973-), Iraqi Shia clergyman and militia leader
Sadr city (Shia township in East Bagdad)

sentences.english: But by 2000, Saad Eddin was becoming a problem for the government.
sentences.chinese: 但是到2000年，薩德已經是讓政府頭疼的人物。

sentences.english: What's Japan's strategic intention for deploying THAAD?
sentences.chinese: 日本擬部署“薩德”有何戰略圖謀？

sentences.english: "I will be prime minister one day hopefully, " Sade said.
sentences.chinese: “我將成爲首相，希望有一天，”薩德說。

sentences.english: For one student called Sade, Abbott's plan seemed to be working.
sentences.chinese: 對於所謂的薩德，雅培的計劃似乎是一個學生的工作。

sentences.english: Thad agrees to one of the judges on my list.
sentences.chinese: 薩德同意了我名單上的一名法官。

sentences.english: Sade is indeed the proof of that.
sentences.chinese: 薩德確實是這種危險的證明。

sentences.english: I also testify that I personally witnessed Thad running out of my house.
sentences.chinese: 我也親自作證目睹了薩德從我家房子裏跑出來。

sentences.english: It was not for all that less dangerous to say it as Sade said it.
sentences.chinese: 即使引用薩德本人的說詞，都仍然是危險重重。

definition: North Korea/Korea as geographic term/Taiwan pr. [Chao2 xian1]
to test-fire/to conduct a missile test
Taiwan independence/(of Taiwan) to declare independence
